short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quality of life improvement to allow University of Washington students to access papers from the off-campus website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enables University of Washington students, researchers, and staff to access academic papers from the off campus digital libraries seamlessly.

When visiting a supported digital library, the extension will replace the link to view the paper's PDF with the proper off-campus link so you don't have to visit the off-campus version of the website. You just click on the button like you usually would inside UW!
